title: Customer Service Standards
content: All customer interactions must be handled with professionalism, empathy, and efficiency. Response time should not exceed 2 minutes for voice calls. Always confirm customer understanding before ending the call.

title: Account Access Policy
content: Customer identity must be verified before providing account information. Acceptable verification methods include: account number + last 4 digits of SSN, email address + security question, or phone number + PIN.

title: Billing Dispute Resolution
content: For billing disputes under $100, agents can issue immediate credits. For disputes over $100, escalate to billing department. Always document the reason for dispute and resolution taken.

title: Technical Support Escalation
content: If unable to resolve technical issues within 10 minutes, offer to escalate to technical support team. Provide customer with ticket number and expected callback time.

title: Privacy and Data Protection
content: Never share customer personal information with unauthorized parties. All conversations are recorded for quality assurance. Customers have the right to request deletion of their data.

title: Service Hours and Availability
content: AI voice assistant is available 24/7. Human agents are available Monday-Friday 8AM-8PM EST, Saturday-Sunday 10AM-6PM EST. Emergency technical support is available 24/7.

title: Refund and Cancellation Policy
content: Customers can cancel service within 30 days for full refund. After 30 days, prorated refunds are available. Cancellation requests must be confirmed via email within 24 hours.

title: Account Security Best Practices
content: Recommend customers use strong passwords, enable two-factor authentication, and never share login credentials. If account compromise is suspected, immediately reset password and review recent activity.

title: Service Level Agreements
content: Standard service uptime guarantee is 99.9%. Planned maintenance windows are announced 48 hours in advance. Service credits are automatically applied for downtime exceeding SLA.

title: Customer Complaint Handling
content: Listen actively to customer concerns, acknowledge their frustration, and focus on solutions. Document all complaints in the system. Follow up within 24 hours if issue cannot be resolved immediately.
